programme.title: The President'S Barber
programme.desc: A man and his family get tangled in decades of political chaos when he was appointed as the president's personal barber.

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: Extreme Job
programme.desc: An ill-performed narcotics team takeover a fried chicken joint near the drug gang's safe house for around-the-clock surveillance. Yet their cooking talent turned the restaurant famous overnight...

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: Pipeline
programme.desc: A team of experts were put together to drill into Koreas oil pipeline and steal petroleum, but the plan takes a turn as the group begin to deceive one another

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: My Perfect Roommate
programme.desc: Living with strangers becomes even more challenging when it comes to 70-year-old lady and young college boy.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Extreme Job
programme.desc: An ill-performed narcotics team takeover a fried chicken joint near the drug gang's safe house for around-the-clock surveillance. Yet their cooking talent turned the restaurant famous overnight...

programme.title: Memories Of Murder
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film follows the path of three detectives as they investigate the grisly rapes and ritualistic killings of local women in small-town of South Korea in 1986.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: Lovers Vanished
programme.desc: Falsely accused of killing his wife and sentenced to life, Soo-In escaped from the prison and fall in love with bar owner Mi-Ya. Yet their love seems destined to lead to heartbreak...

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mother's surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as "Nobleman"...

programme.title: Pipeline
programme.desc: A team of experts were put together to drill into Koreas oil pipeline and steal petroleum, but the plan takes a turn as the group begin to deceive one another

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: BRO&MARBLE in Dubai Ep4
programme.desc: Top celebrities come together to play a real-life Blue Marble game in Dubai with unexpected challenges! Who will survive in crisis and seize both friendship and money as the ultimate winning bro?

programme.desc: Dating reality show <EXchange> is back with season 3! When the ex-couples reunite and start building relationships with each other, will they get back with their ex or date someone new?

programme.desc: Role-playing mystery show <Crime Scene> is back after 7 years! Cast members will be playing different roles in a murder case and have to find out the murderer hidden among them.

programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep23
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep45
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2162
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep29
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kongs neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Fight Back to School III
programme.desc: The millionaire, Million Wong , is found dead in a hotel room. Officer Sing Sing (Stephen Chow) is called in when a man is murdered with an ice pick during sexual intercourse. By an uncanny coincidence the man looks identical to Sing so the decision is made to send him in as an undercover again for further investigation. In the same day, he finds himself with a beautiful wife (Anita Mui), an incompetent sidekick (Anthony Wong) and one very unhappy girlfriend (Cheung Man). All this and somehow he still has to try and solve the case!

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Confinement
programme.desc: Si Ling, a pregnant painter, moves into her dream home after winning an award and hires a confinement nanny. As she begins her one-month confinement after giving birth to her daughter, inexplicable incidents start happening in the house, threatening both her and her baby

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men
programme.desc: Ken is a rich and spoiled young man reluctant to be enlisted into National Service but must do so by law. He has to endure harsh training but it is made more bearable when he befriends three other recruits. When his girlfriend breaks up with him, Ken tries all ways to escape from camp so as to chase her back, but this leads to dire consequences

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Confinement
programme.desc: Si Ling, a pregnant painter, moves into her dream home after winning an award and hires a confinement nanny. As she begins her one-month confinement after giving birth to her daughter, inexplicable incidents start happening in the house, threatening both her and her baby

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: ambushing a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency and send it to a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Danger Has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Ten Tigers Of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yongs novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Longs wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chiefs illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his fathers death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Rape Of The Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Real-life champion martial artist Chen Kuan-Tai plays a powerful role in this memorable saga of action and romance; fighting against gangsters for his true love.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wongs caught in the Mongs territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Pings limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Yings father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt Shaolin Hand Lock from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Lings house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Tales Of A Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes Of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Grindelwald escapes custody and Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Newt Scamander, who agrees to help, unaware of the dangers that lie ahead.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Sister Sister - Glinda the Good's twin sister plans to displace Glinda as the most loved witch in Oz. Melinda thinks being good can't be hard. When each of Melinda's good deeds shows her true colors, Dorothy and the gang figure out there is an imposter.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Moody Magic - Wilhelmina finds a magical mood ring, which she uses to control Dorothy's mood and turn her evil. Wilhelmina might get those ruby slippers if Dorothy doesn't figure out she can overcome the powers of the ring by acting better than she feels

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep38
programme.desc: If The Shoe Fits - Wilhelmina uses a spell to get one of Dorothy's ruby slippers. When she tries to use the slipper, she's whisked away to Under the Rainbow. Dorothy and friends must follow Wilhelmina and reclaim the ruby slipper.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Get Smart - When Nome King kidnaps Professor Wogglebug, T.E., Dorothy and friends must rescue him. They find Nome King has tricked Wogglebug into coming up with the perfect plan to take over Oz. Now, they have to out think the genius to foil the plan.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Mission Imp-Possible - Wilhelmina's Imps make it look like Dorothy is pranking everyone in Oz and the Munchkins put Dorothy in a candy prison. But Dorothy has to escape and stop the Hip-po-gy-raf from terrorising the city!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Wizard Returns - Dorothy and the gang are shocked to discover the Wicked Witch of the West is still alive, but trapped in her crystal ball. Meanwhile, the Wizard makes a dubious return to Oz.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep2
programme.desc: The Wizard Pays A Visit - When the Wizard discovers the Wicked Witch is still alive, he pays her a visit to strike an unsettling deal that will spell trouble for Dorothy and the gang.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Escape From The Crystal Ball - Dorothy and her friends are sucked into the Wicked Witch's crystal ball, where they will spend eternity unless Dorothy makes a tough decision and a sacrifice.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Return Of The Wicked Witch - Having found a way of out the Wicked Witch's crystal ball, Dorothy and the gang discover the Wicked Witch escaped as well, and is inhabiting the body of the Wizard.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Friends And A Magic Crystal - When Lion, Scarecrow, and Tin Man wind up with a baby Woggle-Bug in their care, their parenting skills are put to the test, as is their friendship.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Toto Transformed - Dorothy inadvertently places an enchanted bell on Toto's collar. When it rings three times he's transformed into the legendary creature 'Ozsquatch.' Our heroes go searching for Ozsquatch without realizing it's, Toto, transformed.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Scarecrow Knows Best - When Scarecrow's pride stops him from admitting that he doesn't know how to build a Yellow Brick Bridge, he creates a dangerous overpass. Dorothy and the gang teach him that 'it's okay to not know' some things and rebuild a safer bridge.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep8
programme.desc: General Jinjur - When Dorothy is captured by General Jinjur to be the 'secret weapon' for her all female army, Dorothy's friends search for her and find an unlikely ally in Wilhelmina.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Where-Helmina's My Broom?! - When Wilhelmina's Broom goes missing, she's on a hunt to find out whoever stole it. But after finding out that Broom ran away, Wilhelmina learns that she needs to be nicer to those around her.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Yellow Brick Road Race - Tired of being bullied, Dorothy and the gang challenge the Wheelers to a race -- the winner of which becomes legal owner of the Yellow Brick Road.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Don't Follow The Yellow Brick Road - While Dorothy and her friends are off exploring the road less traveled, the Nome King magically transports Queen Ozma and her Emerald Castle to his underground kingdom, so he can rule over it.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Tallest Munchkin - Lion's regular rounds as King of the Forest are thrown out of whack when he meets Devin, a boy who says he's a giant Munchkin.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Scarecrow Goes To College - Scarecrow leaves his friends to go to college to up his smarts. With the smartest member gone, the Wicked Witch 'infiltrates' the gang as Fake Scarecrow to steal Dorothy's Ruby Slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Welcome To Oz Mitch - When Mitch, another resident of Kansas turns up, Dorothy can't wait to show him all the wonders of Oz! But Oz might not be the right place for this stick in the mud.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Wheeling Tin Man - When Tin Man falls in with the dangerous Wheelers, Dorothy and the guys have to save him before he attempts to jump across Emerald Gorge.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Home Away From Home - The Wizard creates a device so Dorothy will never be homesick. However, when it goes awry and starts replacing things from Oz with things from Kansas, Dorothy is told in order to separate the two worlds, she will have to leave Oz forever!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Vault Heist - When Ozma goes on a trip, she leaves Dorothy and her friends to look after the castle. The Wicked Witch sees an opportunity to get a hold of Ozma's most powerful magic and attempts to get the Wizard to help her break into the magical vault.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Witch One's The Boss - Now that the Wicked Witch has lost her witch powers, she must turn to Wilhelmina in hopes that her niece can help her get her evil magic groove back. Meanwhile, Dorothy and the gang help the Wizard get a handle on his magic powers.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Wingmen No More - After failing Wilhelmina for the last time, Frank and Lyman are stripped of their wings and replaced. Meanwhile, their wings attach themselves to Lion and Scarecrow. Dorothy has to make things right or Frank and Lyman are. Wingmen No More.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Hammer Time - Dorothy uses some Kansas know how to corral a dangerous mob of creatures known as Hammerheads before they can destroy Emerald City's new museum.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Jest Kidding - The Wicked Witch gives Ozma's unfunny Jester a laughing charm, which leaves Dorothy and crew helpless with hysterics.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Sisterhood Of The Witch - When the Sisterhood of the Witch discovers the Wicked Witch has lost her powers, a rival witch takes over her castle and now the Wicked Witch must recruit the Wizard to help regain control of the castle.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep23
programme.desc: The Old Classic - When Wilhelmina temporarily loses her powers, she has Frank and Lyman go undercover to try and get Dorothy's ruby slippers, but the monkeys find out that it's easy to get in too deep.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Too Predictable - When the Wizard invents a magical device called the Predictalizer that can predict with one hundred percent accuracy the day of every single citizen of Oz, Dorothy thinks things have become a little too predictable.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Oztember Surprise - After the Wicked Witch tricks the Wizard into sharing his powers for an Oztember celebration, Dorothy and her friends must stop her from making the change permanent.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 13
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin reveal the ultimate hands-free mower and find hacks for removing carpet stains. Plus, they'll hack a chandelier and learn from pros with Becky's Beauty Hacks and Broke Ass Bob's guide to owning a dog.

programme.title: Gotham S1 2
programme.desc: Detectives Gordon (Ben McKenzie) and Bullock (Donal Logue) investigate a child trafficking ring preying on Gothams street kids, including Selina Kyle (Camren Bicondova).

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 22
programme.desc: Working as a florist, Michael nukes flowers, sheds light on frog mutation, and turns an ant farm into a work of art. Later, he shocks a passerby in the park with his cat-dog, and then stuns someone else with a delivery from up above.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 7
programme.desc: The guys are forced to look for love in all the wrong places at a singles' event, and then phone it in making embarrassing calls on strangers' cells. And there's no happily-ever-after for tonight's big loser when his storybook ending becomes a humiliating sob story.

programme.desc: When a group of teenagers gets involved with a case of counterfeit money, it strikes a chord with Murtaugh.Meanwhile, Riggs pays a visit to someone from his past.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 21
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke bring back a failed lawnmower hack, but will it work this time? Plus, Kevin tests cheese-cutting hacks for your next charcuterie, and there's been a MURDER - murder mystery that is. Fortunately, Hack 911 is on the case.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 22
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test out a new toilet hack that will have you seeing in the dark, and Brooke has tips for hacking your dating profile. Plus, it's the shock of the season when Seor Solucin finally meets his match, his mother-in-law.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 5
programme.desc: You have the right to remain stupid! TruTV brings you 20 of the dumbest outlaws ever to fight the law and lose. This perp walk includes a drunk driving squirrel, nude news crasher, grand theft puppy, and a stick-up woman whose bra is packing. Takingthese criminals to task is our celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Tonya Harding, Jared Logan, and Kevin McCaffrey.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 6
programme.desc: Knuckleheads, start your engines! TruTV is hitting the road with 20 of the dumbest motorheads ever to ignore traffic laws. You'll see a passed out pilot, road rage rants, a nearly-too-hot-for-TV motorcycle ride, and a mail truck that delivers a hit.Keeping the show on the road is our celebrity cast, including Danny Bonaduce, Leif Garrett, Mike Trainor, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep16
programme.desc: One Of Our Angels Is Missing - Bondsman Harry Silvers hires the Angels to locate accused jewel thief Ray Devlin, who has fled, jumping bail. Using a cover as a wealthy divorcee, Kris is to lure Devlin from an Arizona resort back to Los Angeles.

programme.title: Bonanza S1 Ep17
programme.desc: The Outcast - An outcast woman named Leta Malvet is helped by the Cartwrights after her father and brother are hanged for murder. Clay Renton, Leta's beau, arrives in town.

programme.title: Bonanza S1 Ep18
programme.desc: A House Divided - Confederate sympathizer Frederick Kyle schemes to tear apart Virginia City and the Cartwrights. Ben tries to uncover his agenda after he befriends Little Joe.

programme.title: The Nanny S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Deep Throat - When all three Sheffield kids take sick at the same time, Fran and Niles are tested by their never-ending demands. Meanwhile, with her sorority reunion coming up, C.C. struggles to keep Maxwell from getting the flu that has leveled his children.

programme.title: The Waltons S2 Ep21
programme.desc: The Fulfillment - Through the Waltons, an eight-year-old orphan boy finds a home.

programme.title: Frasier S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Retirement Is Murder - Frasier plays amateur sleuth after becoming caught up in Martins obsession with a twenty-year-old unsolved murder.

programme.title: The Bionic Woman S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Sanctuary Earth - After a satellite returns unexpectedly to Earth, Jaime discovers a 14-year-old girl has hitched a ride in the vehicle.

programme.title: Frasier S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Fool Me Once Shame On You Fool Me Twice - After a thief steals Frasiers briefcase and his car, Frasier sets a trap to catch him in the act.

programme.title: ALF S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Weird Science - ALF shares his special intergalactic knowledge with Brian, who gets into trouble when he tells his class there are 11 planets in our solar system.

programme.title: The Waltons S2 Ep22
programme.desc: The Ghost Story - Curiosity over a Ouija Board and the memory of an unexplained phenomenon that Olivia experienced after the death of a childhood friend create an eerie scene in the Walton household.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island S2 Ep09
programme.desc: Nyet, Nyet -- Not Yet - Two Russian cosmonauts and their capsule land on the island by mistake.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep09
programme.desc: The Short, Happy Circuit of Aunt Clara - The Stephens are invited to the Tate home to meet a client who manufactures shoes. Darrin agrees to let Aunt Clare babysit when Samantha tells him Aunt Clara is sad because she has lost her boy friend

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Discover how succulent stuffed olives get from branch to jar; how 12,000 plates of tasty tortellini are made per day; how locally-sourced ingredients make the best cranberry pumpkin-seed baguettini.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Discover how traditional methods still factor into modern-day croissant production; why shredding is key to make delicious rhubarb strawberry jam; how a spice tumbler produces the best tasting stuffing.

programme.title: Primates S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Family Matters - For primates, family is everything. Complex social lives are key to their success.

programme.title: The Last Overland S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Roof of the World - Back in 1955 Tim had arrived in Nepal by crossing the Middle East, but today Iran is hostile, Iraq fragile, and Syria still at war. Alex and Nat are forced on a detour through western China and Central Asia, a journey filled with dangers of its own.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep8
programme.desc: How did a team of engineers nicknamed the"extreme team"build a futuristic research station in theworld'smost extreme climate, and how do you made a 3.5 tonne concrete arch appear to levitate?

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S2 Ep5
programme.desc: South Africa - Robson travels 6000 miles to the most southerly point of Africa to take on an extreme fishing challenge.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - The Geladas of Ethiopia Ep5
programme.desc: Geladas are only found among the peaks and plateaus of Ethiopias Simien Mountains, an ancient range of incredible beauty and biodiversity. We follow the Mountain Band of Geladas as they make their daily migration from the cliff edge to the mountaintop.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - Search for the Secret Bear Ep1
programme.desc: The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Elephant Dilemma Ep2
programme.desc: Theres a new arrival at the Elephant Transit Home: a sick elephant calf abandoned near a reserve, another victim in the battle for space between humans and elephants. Study the innovative efforts to end this conflict, led by Dr. Pruthu Fernando.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Annas clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Annas scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 10 Ep10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the centers aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote thats too people-friendly.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life Begins Ep1
programme.desc: For the first few weeks of life, the world is a frightening place. Danger lurks around every corner. It pays to be alert. Whether predator or prey. Any day might be your last. The race is on to grow up fast- for even the largest animals are vulnerable to attack.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Lessons Ep2
programme.desc: If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. Some have months to grow-up; other have decades but all, have lots to learn along the way. From getting to grips with their bodies and learning to feed themselves, to practicing fighting skills and learning how to form friendships. There are many hurdles along the way, but every small success could mean the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Baboons of Bambelela Ep4
programme.desc: With power in numbers, adaptability and intelligent leadership, the Bambelela baboon troop is an excellent example of why baboons thrive throughout Africa. Their highly refined social behavior and organization mirror much of human society and show just how alike we are to our primate cousins.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - The Geladas of Ethiopia Ep5
programme.desc: Geladas are only found among the peaks and plateaus of Ethiopias Simien Mountains, an ancient range of incredible beauty and biodiversity. We follow the Mountain Band of Geladas as they make their daily migration from the cliff edge to the mountaintop.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Legacies Ep3
programme.desc: For every species on earth the right to mate is the purpose of life. Passing on your genes to the next generation is every animals legacy. But its not easy, it can be a struggle to find a mate and then a fight to gain access. Only the strongest and most determined will win at Luangwas mating game.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Eclipse of the Pride Lands Ep3
programme.desc: How close do you want to get to a lion? The staff must get close enough to place radio transmitting collars on them to keep track of the lion population.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Baboons of Bambelela Ep4
programme.desc: With power in numbers, adaptability and intelligent leadership, the Bambelela baboon troop is an excellent example of why baboons thrive throughout Africa. Their highly refined social behavior and organization mirror much of human society and show just how alike we are to our primate cousins.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - The Geladas of Ethiopia Ep5
programme.desc: Geladas are only found among the peaks and plateaus of Ethiopias Simien Mountains, an ancient range of incredible beauty and biodiversity. We follow the Mountain Band of Geladas as they make their daily migration from the cliff edge to the mountaintop.

programme.desc: Welcome Annas clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Annas scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 11 Ep11
programme.desc: Join the rescue team for a madcap chase after a red-tailed hawk. He may be unable to fly, but he sure can run! Then follow the recovery of a rare albino squirrel who cant walk, and see how the medical team ensures hell be ready for the wild again.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Devils of Even Tide Ep4
programme.desc: Ol Pejeta has a growing hyena population and staff must take the first-ever census of these very effective nocturnal hunters.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Yukon Wild Ep2
programme.desc: The Yukon is a true wilderness, one of the last on Earth. The vast land got its name from its longest river, which the Gwichin, one of the indigenous people of the region, call "Yu-kun- ah", or, the "great river". The third longest waterway in North America, the Yukon River flows through wide open valleys and narrow channels over 3,000 km Northwest towards the storm tossed Bering Sea.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park Ep5
programme.desc: In the southern reaches of Africas great Kalahari basin, everything is made tough. Ancient rivers harbor water deep underground, and these hidden lifelines forge a fragile link to survival. This is the Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Baboons of Bambelela Ep4
programme.desc: With power in numbers, adaptability and intelligent leadership, the Bambelela baboon troop is an excellent example of why baboons thrive throughout Africa. Their highly refined social behavior and organization mirror much of human society and show just how alike we are to our primate cousins.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Power Ep9
programme.desc: Power-up with alphas who use might to subdue enemies. Marvel when sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the savannah with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Ugly Ep10
programme.desc: Confront alphas with faces only a mother could love. Inspect warthogs lumpy armour, giant African bullfrogs outsized jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles crushingly powerful jaws.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 - Forests Ep1
programme.desc: Australia is home to the world's most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, it's a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can bite, poison or maim.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Loners Ep11
programme.desc: Sidle up to lone wolf alphas whod rather go solo. Take a glacial stroll alongside a Galpagos tortoise; dance with venomous European adders; watch a face-tearing battle between Lacerta lizards; and gasp at leopard seals amazing stealth attacks.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Chatty/Communicative Ep12
programme.desc: Connect with Earths most talkative species. Meet capuchin monkeys, who definitely dont take a vow of silence; endure Eurasian river otters chilling screams; face angry fruit bats loud complaints; and explore orcas human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 12 Ep12
programme.desc: Check in with the centres resident turkey vulture, whos ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Pendulum of Existence Ep5
programme.desc: Four North African white rhinos are settled at Ol Pejeta. The staff must prepare them for a return, not just to life in a semi-wild environment, but also to try and trigger their wild instincts particularly their desire to breed.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Waiting for Winter Ep3
programme.desc: Its November at Cape Tatnam. Winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay. But the ice - which should be forming on Hudson Bay by now - is nowhere to be seen. 2016 has been the warmest year on record. In late November, the temperature is 10 degrees warmer than its average. Climate change is wreaking havoc across the North. At just below zero degrees Celsius, the sea cannot freeze.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Chobe National Park: Land of Learning Ep6
programme.desc: In the north of Botswana there is a haven where the Chobe River provides a lifeline for wildlife, but in the dry season many animals face a daily battle with the fierce heat, Including three of Africas most iconic families: lions, elephants and baboons. Though they may be vastly different, they all have the same goal: to raise their young.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - The Geladas of Ethiopia Ep5
programme.desc: Geladas are only found among the peaks and plateaus of Ethiopias Simien Mountains, an ancient range of incredible beauty and biodiversity. We follow the Mountain Band of Geladas as they make their daily migration from the cliff edge to the mountaintop.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 - Vietnam: the Journey's End Ep10
programme.desc: The Mekong Delta is one of the largest on Earth. Formed over the last 8000 years, it fans out and discharges into the South China Sea via nine channels. These channels split and shape the coastline, creating unique habitats for a variety of animals.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - The Geladas of Ethiopia Ep5
programme.desc: Geladas are only found among the peaks and plateaus of Ethiopias Simien Mountains, an ancient range of incredible beauty and biodiversity. We follow the Mountain Band of Geladas as they make their daily migration from the cliff edge to the mountaintop.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.
